name: 曾德樟
objective:
1.Introduction and Review
2.Baseband Pulse Transmission
3.Signal-Space Analysis
4.Passband Digital transmission
5.Spread-Spectrum Modulation
6.Fundamental limits in information theory
schedule:
1.Introduction and  Review:(第一週-第三週)
(1). Digital Communication Systems
(2). Random Process
(3). White Noise / Narrowband Noise
2.Baseband Pulse Transmission:(第四週-第六週)
(1). Matched filter
(2). Nyquist's Criterion for Distortionless Baseband Binary
Transmission

(1). Geometric Representation of Signals
(2). Coherent Detection of Signals in Noise

(1). Passband Transmission Model
(2). Coherent Phase-Shift Keying

(4). Coherent Frequency-Shift Keying
(5). Noncoherent Binary Frequency-Shift Keying
(6). Differential Phase-Shift Keying
(7). Comparison of Digital Modulation Schemes Using a Single
Carrier
5.Spread-Spectrum Modulation:(第十四週-第十五週)
(1). A Notion of Spread Spectrum
(2). Direct-Sequence Spread Spectrum
(3). Frequency-Hop Spread Spectrum
6. Funadmental limits in information theory:(第十六週-第十八週)
(1). Source-Coding Theorem
(2). Channel-Coding Theorem
(3). Information Capacity Theorem
(4). Rate Distortion Theory
